body_html:
@SsnL Thanks. However, when do RNN training and set batch_first = True, setting dim = 1 in nn.DataParallel is not useful.

For example:
Input of shape: (batch_size, seq_len, input_size)
Hidden of shape: (num_layers * num_directions, batch_size, hidden_size)

When set dim = 1 in nn.DataParallel, it only can chunk the hidden state correctly, while input is chunked in the seq_len dimension.

@SsnL Thanks. However, when do RNN training and set ```batch_first = True```, setting ```dim = 1``` in ```nn.DataParallel``` is not useful. 

For example:
Input of shape: ```(batch_size, seq_len, input_size)```
Hidden of shape: ```(num_layers * num_directions, batch_size, hidden_size)```

When set ```dim = 1``` in ```nn.DataParallel```, it only can chunk the hidden state correctly, while input is chunked in the ```seq_len``` dimension.
